settings.label: Message

settings.content: üí° Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.

üí° For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/help-script-find-money-formats).
üí° Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: USD.

settings.label: Currency codes
settings.info: [See the full list of currency codes](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php)
